annotation: Was previously marked as set 8 (eg POc [tuki]). The [t] and [k] line up correctly (at least with Basai:Pawley's POc), but distribution + reduplicated Basai form makes the connection seem less plausible to me. -EG
as in target; e.g. rifle or boxing
"to hit (with a weapon)", "to throw", "to shoot (with a gun)"
'to hit (with an object - wtihout any other specification -)'
Means 'to hit' without intrument specification in the lexicon

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
